title.rendered: OFFROAD ANIMAL ROCKSLIDERS AND SCRUB RAILS – SUITABLE FOR TOYOTA LANDCRUISER 78 and 79 SERIES, 2007 TO 2022

content.rendered:
Rock Sliders and Scrub Rails, suitable for Toyota Land Cruiser 78 and 79 Series, 2007 to 2022

A very innovative design has made these super tough sliders easier to fit than most others.  First install the 3 heavy duty steel brackets on chassis, then install our awesome backbone and tread step.  The backbone is made from ultra tough 6061 T6 Aluminium extrusion that is designed to be much stronger than any steel section other are using. Being similar in weight and much stronger, it also allows for easy fitment of the steel tread plate step.

Option up to have the Offroad Animal scrub rails if you have our Toro bar for even better protection.

 

These come standard in Matte Black. The slider step with scrub rails is different to the step with no scrub rails.  The mounting brackets and extrusion however are the same

Benefits

  • Seriously protects side of your Land Cruiser
  • Handy step for getting in and out of your wagon or accessing roof rack
  • Looks way better than any other slider out there
  • Did I mention these bad boys look fully sick bro
  • Easy install

Features

  • Angled up by 30 degrees for awesome off-road clearance.
  • Heavy duty steel brackets mount individually direct to chassis and to backbone
  • Crazy strong backbone, made from Aluminium 6061 T6 Extrusion
  • Tough steel step with extruded tread for nice look and feel, and actually works heaps better than diamond plate for grip

Suits all LC79 models 2007-2022 dual cab only,

Weight:65.00 KGS

 

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Toyota Land Cruiser!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
